message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is worth more than $12000 to me, but I'm willing to consider your valuation. Let's work together to find a fair price that reflects its true value while ensuring you get a great deal. Here's my initial offer: $15000. I look forward to your response.

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I'm looking for a better deal. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me is no more than $15000. I'm open to negotiations and hope we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
